blocks.code: return errors.New("perf: event ring not mapped")

case <-ctx.Done():
	active := false
	err := ctx.Err()
	if err == context.Canceled {

		val := uint64(1)
		buf := (*[8]byte)(unsafe.Pointer(&val))[:]
		unix.Write(ev.wakeupfd, buf)
		active = true
	}
	<-ev.pollresp

	if active {
		var buf [8]byte
		unix.Read(ev.wakeupfd, buf[:])
	}
	return err
